summary: Antoine helps two former acquaintances escape the country, who repay him with a debt transfer. All he has to do is collect from some Léonard Michalon, but for that he will have to go into much trouble to keep the man alive.
cast: Lino Ventura|Mireille Darc|Jean Lefebvre|Michel Constantin|Sylvia Sorrente|Thierry Thibaud|Marcel Bernier|Mick Besson|France Rumilly|André Pousse|Robert Dalban|Jacques Zabor|Serge Sauvion|Tommy Duggan|Philippe Castelli|Guy Henry|Jean Panisse|Jacques Richard
title: Los gángsters no se jubilan
